pubspec.name: audio_service
pubspec.description: Flutter plugin to play audio in the background while the screen is off.

sections.title: Support multiple platforms
sections.summary:
### [*] 20/20 points: Supports 3 of 3 possible platforms (**iOS**, **Android**, **Web**)

Found 8 issues. Showing the first 2:


Consider supporting these prerelease platforms:

<details>
<summary>
Package does not support Flutter platform `Windows`.
</summary>

Because:
* `package:audio_service/audio_service.dart` that declares support for platforms: `Android`, `iOS`, `macOS`, `Web`.
</details>
